query: "Did I receive the Hepatitis B vaccine before my trip in August 2017?"
resource_summaries:
This record is about a completed Hepatitis B adult immunization administered on August 16, 2017, to a patient during an encounter with a primary care provider at PCP167180.
This record is about a completed Hepatitis B adult immunization administered on August 28, 2019, to a patient during an encounter with a primary care provider at PCP167180.
answer: Yes, you did receive the Hepatitis B vaccine before your trip in August 2017.
